effect.sun_moon: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power. Changes nature power to thunderbolt.

short_effect.sun_moon: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: For five turns, prevents all Pokémon on the ground from sleeping and strengthens their electric moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. Pokémon on the ground no longer fall asleep.
